name: Chick'Chick Boom
description:
Always wanted to be a chicken terminator? Now you can! Being an automated fast-food employee has never been so much fun.

Submission for Ludum Dare 51, you can download the game there! sadly enough we did not manage to complete the project before the deadline. 

Link to Ludum Dare entry

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/$299144

Third person controller template credit

https://github.com/selgesel/godot4-third-person-controller

Assets used

https://vertexcat.itch.io/farm-animals-set

https://mylifesucks69.itch.io/low-poly-buildings

https://quaternius.itch.io/150-lowpoly-nature-models

https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/3d-low-poly-car-game-asset-pack-vehicles-free

https://quaternius.itch.io/lowpoly-farm-buildings

https://mylifesucks69.itch.io/low-poly-buildings
